description: Interface describing a blob storage entry.

dateCreated.description: The date/time when the entry was created.

dateModified.description: The date/time when the entry was modified.

blobSize.description: The size of the data in the blob.

blobHash.description: The hash of the data in the blob.

encodingFormat.description: The mime type for the blob.

isEncrypted.description: Indicates if the blob is encrypted.

metadata.description: The metadata for the blob as JSON-LD.

blob.description: The blob in base64 format, included if the includeContent flag was set in the request.
